page.title: 03STEAD McALPINE
page.content: The firm of Stead McAlpine is unusual in that it is situated in a small village outside of Carlisle next to the river Caldew.The firm has been producing high quality printed fabrics there for over 150 years.The firm was bought by the John Lewis partnership in 1966 but Stead Mcalpine is actually a co-operative with all of the employees owning shares in the company. Today the company prints over seven million metres of cloth a year and has a catalouge of over two thousand designs.Ofthis huge quantity of quality material which sells at the top end of the price market,one third goes directly to the U.S.A. one third goes to United Kingdom customers who then export it as finished goods and the final third stays in the country.All this material is screen printed
